signUp.title: Register Account
signUp.heading: Register Account Request
signUp.body: We have received your request to register an account. Please click the link below to register your account:
signUp.ignoreText: If you did not request to register an account, please ignore this email.
signUp.expireText: This link will expire in 1 hour.

passwordReset.title: Password Reset
passwordReset.heading: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.body: We have received a request to reset your password. Please click the link below to reset your password:
passwordReset.ignoreText: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
passwordReset.expireText: This link will expire in 1 hour.

emailVerification.title: Email Verification
emailVerification.heading: Email Change Verification
emailVerification.body: You have requested to change your email address. Please use the following verification code to verify your new email address:
emailVerification.ignoreText: If you did not request this email change, please ignore this email and your current email address will remain unchanged.
emailVerification.expireText: This code will expire in 5 minutes.

emailChangeNotification.title: Email Change Notification
emailChangeNotification.heading: Your Email Has Been Changed
emailChangeNotification.body: This is a security notification to inform you that your email address has been successfully changed:
emailChangeNotification.securityNotice: If you did not make this change, please contact our support team immediately as your account may have been compromised.
emailChangeNotification.ignoreText: If you authorized this change, no further action is needed.

emailOtp.title: Email Verification
emailOtp.heading: Verify your email
emailOtp.body: Enter this code to complete your sign in:
emailOtp.ignoreText: If you didn't request this code, you can safely ignore this email.

invite.bodyNewUserSuffix: Click the link below to create your account and join the space:
